title: One Piece

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
awardEventDetails.description: Cole Brown (As the voice of "Marshall D. Teach/Blackbeard".)

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Vocal Ensemble in an Anime Television Series/OVA
awardEventDetails.description: Colleen Clinkenbeard - Travis Willingham - R. Bruce Elliott - Ed Blaylock - Andrew Love - Jason Douglas - Ray Hurd - Brian Mathis - Mike McFarland - Cole Brown

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
awardEventDetails.description: Christopher Corey Smith (As the voice of "Spandam".)

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Female Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
awardEventDetails.description: Jad Saxton (As the voice of "Nico Robin (Young)".)

awardEventDetails.title: 2013 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Female Lead Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA
awardEventDetails.description: Brina Palencia (As the voice of "Tony Tony Chopper".)
